review: Bought it as a gift. Friend loved it very much.
I always have problem finding pick when I need them, and this product helps me solve the issue. It is easy to use.
I like the quality of the picks. Not too hard or soft and quite fit to my play style. Thanks!
Can't hold tightly on 1st string (low C), a little buzz.
Fit perfect to my Taylor T5 and no cons I can find so far. If you want a capo for guitar, this one is the one stop shopping for you.
